Hello,

Let's all slow down a little and not get everyone involved. First I=
 
will apologize to the list for this debacle. Second I will apologize 
to =
SecretarytoCapt3 for downloading the stuff. I will explain, I use 
a downlo=
ad manager that spiders ftps, file server and whole 
websites. I was at wor=
k and yes was doing this on the side so I let 
it run automatically instead=
 of downloading the links provided one 
by one. I have not taken an in-dept=
h look at the files provided and 
when I get to work will delete them. Yes =
this whole thing was =96my- 
fault and no I did not mean to steal anyone's =
files nor bandwidth 
but this is what happens when a person does not pay en=
ough 
attention. My apologies.

To the list, I'm sorry you guys got involve=
d in my stupidity. I hope 
that SHQ will remain to serve the community that=
 visits it and not 
be stuck in this one event. I will now excuse myself fr=
om this list 
so as to prevent events of this kind and so that the list can=
 
conduct its activities in a confident manner. I implore you to 
conduct y=
our fandom as usual and put this incident behind you.

To the Mods and Secr=
etarytoCapt3 if you have further inquiries let 
me know via e-mail.

~Kizu
=
